name: ParameterChecker_checkParameterTypeTest
description: Unit tests for the ParameterChecker.checkParameterType method, which validates the type of a given parameter.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeValidString
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with a valid String parameter.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeValidInteger
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with a valid Integer parameter.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeInvalidType
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with an invalid type (Integer passed as String).

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeEmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with an empty String parameter.
